opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States

opinion:
548 U.S. 922 (2006)

SOECHTING
v.
PERRY, GOVERNOR OF TEXAS, ET AL.

No. 05-298.

Supreme Court of United States.

June 30, 2006.

The Court affirmed in part, reversed in part, and vacated in part the judgment below in League of United Latin American Citizens v. Perry, ante, p. 399. Judgment affirmed with respect to the claims in these *923 cases. JUSTICE STEVENS and JUSTICE BREYER would reverse the judgment.
